properties.title: Maven Dashboard Report Plugin : FindBugs support

section.name: About FindBugs Support in Maven Dashboard Report Plugin
section.p: Unlike most Maven plug-ins, FindBugs is a proprietary tool that stores its data in an xml file which is not generated by default.
In order for the Dashboard to be able to extract FindBugs's results, you'll need to update the FindBugs report in the reporting section of your POM as follows:

ul.li: Do not use the findbugs "<xmlOutputDirectory/>" config option if you want the dashboard to include the findbugs summary section. see MOJO-987 JIRA issue.
